reviews.review_msg: Makes you think critically and brainwashes you with his points of view. Be prepared to read 50+ pages weekly and receive 1 mark for writing key concepts from each reading required. Too much work if you're looking for an easy A but Stephen gives solid lectures and is passionate about the material he teaches. Would not take this prof again.

Mr. Buckley is an engaging instructor and knows how to teach material and get students to understand it. With that being said, his courses are highly ideological and don't explore viewpoints other than his own. He looks at labour issues though a very left wing lens. If you let him indoctrinate you will do well in his courses.
